data.title: Aggressive B Site Ruse Smokes to Contest Mid Site
data.description: Use these set of smokes when looking to contest aggressively towards the B Site.

data.title: Standard B Site Ruse Smokes For Snow + Orange
data.description: Use these set of smokes when you are looking to prioritize planting the spike, however top B Site is open.

data.title: Standard Nest A Post Plant Ruse One Way
data.description: Here's an easy, but powerful one way smoke to use during post plant at A Site.

data.title: Standard Front Site A + Heaven Ruse Exec
data.description: Use this standard, but powerful smoke setup when executing the A Site.
